title: Ping Glide 2.0 Wedges
subHead: All the pros are using this thing now!
text: Launched today, in the bag tomorrow. #Glide 2.0 straight in play for lots of our tour staff at the #ADGolfChamps this week. #PlayYourBest

title: Ping i200 Irons
subHead: Toss your old irons in the trash!
text: #i200's smooth hosel-to-face transition, minimal offset, thin top rail & sharper face radius help create the tour-inspired aesthetics.
